item.title: Microsoft recognized for second consecutive year as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data Science and Machine Learning Platforms
item.description: We’re proud to share that Microsoft has once again been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data Science and Machine Learning (DSML) Platforms. The post Microsoft recognized for second consecutive year as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data Science and Machine Learning Platforms appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-recognized-for-second-consecutive-year-as-a-leader-in-the-2025-gartner-magic-quadrant-for-data-science-and-machine-learning-platforms/
